Items.Script: The iron helper drew the biggest card available, but lost - the merchant's friend had stronger cards. Then the robot decided to end the game and move on.
There was an inn nearby, and the robot decided to ask the workers how to get to the castle in the mountains.

He was no longer feared, but warmly welcomed - the woman who dropped the apples told everyone about the kindness and generosity of the iron man. The tavern worker brought a map and began to show the robot the route.
